name: @lanonasis/security-service
description: Enterprise-grade security service for secrets, API keys, and access control

scripts.test:packages: npm install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock --prefix oauth-client && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock --prefix security-sdk && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock --prefix web && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-package-lock --prefix vortex-secure/packages/vortex-mcp-sdk && npm run test --prefix oauth-client && npm run test --prefix security-sdk && npm run test --prefix web && npm run test --prefix vortex-secure/packages/vortex-mcp-sdk

author: Seye Derick
